name: Nurtureymaths
0:
”Alexa, open nurturey maths”
”How good are my maths skills?”
”Can you repeat?”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: nurturey maths
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The skill aims to improve mental mathematical calculation capability of young children.

It acts as a teacher that asks relevant age and capability related maths questions. Topics currently covered are Addition, Subtraction, Multiplication, Division and Times tables.

Note: We DON'T collect any personal information from the child.

The skill is linked to a user's (parent's) Nurturey account that has the relevant information provided ONLY by the parents/adult users - providing a secure, safe and seamless experience for the kids and parents.
